mapper.insert: insert into teacher_question_likes (id, teacher_id, question_id, creation_time, likes) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{likes,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, teacher_id, question_id, creation_time, likes from teacher_question_likes
